data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tumkur, Karnataka, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tumkur, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Tumkur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Tumkur. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Tumkur to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kollara Karnataka people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Tumkur against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tumkur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Tumkur that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

location.name: Tumkur
location.people_groups_list: Amma Kodaga, Naikadaya, Khetri, Kanate, Binapatta
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Amma Kodaga (2,000), Naikadaya (200), Khetri (200), Kanate (500), Binapatta (300)
